sentences.en: Amplification in the high turnover at all to sell.
sentences.cn: 成交量在高位放大时全部卖.

sentences.en: Amplification of resistance, however , was found only in polyresistant Beijing genotype strains.
sentences.cn: 耐药扩增仅在北京基因型单耐药菌株表现明显.

sentences.en: At this point in the outbreak, an amplification event would be a setback capable of extending the presently intense containment efforts for several weeks.
sentences.cn: 在暴发的这一时刻，扩大事件将是一次挫折，能将目前紧张的控制努力延续数周。

sentences.en: ConclusionThis amplification system is very economical, convenient, and the band is clear and stable.
sentences.cn: 结论该反应体系具有经济, 简便以及扩增条带较清晰而稳定等特点.

sentences.en: Distributed Raman amplification is well known in the art.
sentences.cn: 分布式拉曼放大是本领域公知的.

sentences.en: Due to insertion loss, the signal may require amplification.
sentences.cn: 由于存在插入损耗, 所以信号可能需要放大.

sentences.en: Hall sensor which contains signal amplification and waveform shaping.
sentences.cn: 其中霍尔传感器包含信号放大和波形整形.

sentences.en: Internal amplification control ( IAC ) was designed for SDA to achieve accuracy of the results.
sentences.cn: SDA技术设立的内扩增质量控制 ( IAC ) 可确保检测结果的准确性.

sentences.en: Methods: The erm genes of MRCNS were detected by degenerate primers amplification.
sentences.cn: 方法 　 应用兼并引物扩增MRCNS菌的erm基因.

sentences.en: Operating on the borderline of superconductivity and ordinary conductivity, they produce immense amplification.
sentences.cn: 它们在超导性和普通导电性的临界线上操作, 产生巨大的放大效果.

sentences.en: Passive current amplification has been realized due to this characteristic.
sentences.cn: 利用这种特性实现了无源电流放大.

sentences.en: Purpose: General purpose switching and amplification, such as audio output stages.
sentences.cn: 用途: 一般用途开关和放大, 音频输出级.

sentences.en: Since the Greek language in which John wrote had no exclamation marks, he used an amplification technique that is common in Scriptures.
sentences.cn: 后来约翰用希腊语写作没有惊叹的标志，他在经文中普片的使用用一种放大的手法。

sentences.en: The principle and development for difference amplification is in this paper.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了位相差放大基本原理和研究进展.

sentences.en: The voice of despair may be weak and need amplification.
sentences.cn: 绝望的呼声可能很微弱，需要扩大。

sentences.en: To improve efficiency of power amplification circuit, circuits is being improved ceaselessly.
sentences.cn: 为了提高功放电路的效率, 电路被不断改进.

sentences.en: We may conclude that transistors will be used wherever efficient amplification required within a small space.
sentences.cn: 我们可以得出结论,凡是在小体积里需要有效放大的场合,都要采用晶体管.

words.tran_cn: [电子] 放大器，扩大器；扩音器
